channel.title: release on WM Seismic Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in release on WM Seismic Solutions

item.title: WMPlugins 6.6.10 Release
item.description: Announcing the release of version 6.6.10 of the WMPlugins a suite of opensource plugins that extend the opensource seismic interpretation system OpendTect. This release is built against OpendTect 6.6.7.

item.title: First Release of Python Bindings to OpendTect
item.description: The 6.6.8 release of the wmPlugins includes a Python module, wmodpy, to access OpendTect survey and well information. Unlike OpendTect’s existing odpy module, wmodpy is a direct binding to the OpendTect C++ code.
